scripts.test-db: node -e "const pgp = require('pg-promise')(); require('dotenv').config(); const db = pgp(process.env.DATABASE_URL); db.one('SELECT NOW() as current_time, version()').then(result => { console.log('✅ Database connected!'); console.log('📅', result.current_time); console.log('🗄️', result.version.split(',')[0]); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
